## Getting started

To install run:
```bash
pip install aloon
```

## Usage

#### Normal use


### Options

#### -h, --help
Prints help message.

#### --stringtocvs
导出Android 指定语言的string文件到CVS

## Release History
* 2020-12-29   v0.1.0  导出指定语言到CSV文件
